overview.description: Reading and Use of English paper in the

criteria: Understanding of main ideas and specific information
Recognition of opinion, attitude, mood, purpose, feeling
Understanding of text organization and cohesion
Understanding of vocabulary and grammar in context

tasks.name: Part 1: Multiple-choice cloze
tasks.description: Focus on vocabulary, e.g. idioms, collocations, fixed phrases, complementation, phrasal verbs, semantic precision.

tasks.name: Part 2: Open cloze
tasks.description: Focus on grammar and vocabulary, e.g. articles, auxiliaries, prepositions, pronouns, verb forms, word formation.

tasks.name: Part 3: Word formation
tasks.description: Focus on vocabulary, specifically word formation using prefixes, suffixes, internal changes.

tasks.name: Part 4: Key word transformation
tasks.description: Focus on grammar and vocabulary, testing ability to express a message in different ways.

tasks.name: Part 5: Multiple choice
tasks.description: Focus on understanding of detail, opinion, attitude, tone, purpose, main idea, implication, text organization.

tasks.name: Part 6: Cross-text multiple matching
tasks.description: Focus on understanding of detail, opinion, attitude, specific information across texts.

tasks.name: Part 7: Multiple matching
tasks.description: Focus on understanding of detail, opinion, specific information, implication.
